settings.heading: The Artisan's Journey
settings.content: Forged by hands and bound by soul. Our master jewelers spent hours meticulously polishing the 14K gold-plated alloy, ensuring that every facet of the necklace catches the light of your shared memories. The eternal rose is hand-selected and preserved at the peak of its beauty to signify a love that blooms forever.

settings.heading: The Meaning
settings.content: The apple is a historical symbol of profound devotion and romance. Inside, the eternal rose represents purity and longevity, while the necklace rests close to the heart—a constant reminder of a sacred bond. This bundle is designed as a modern heirloom, perfect for partners, mothers, or grandmothers to celebrate multi-generational love.

settings.heading: Materials & Care
settings.content: Includes a 14K gold/white gold plated clavicle chain (18" adjustable) designed to resist tarnishing. The eternal rose is a premium scented soap flower that lasts indefinitely. Keep away from direct sunlight and moisture to preserve its ethereal beauty.
